title: Autofill is broken
body:
And not for the reason you think, i made the mistake of updating my graphic driver earlier (which league always manages to hate, even though every other program is fine with it.) so i went fill and queued for a ranked game, and crashed, then had to roll back my drivers, obviously the game was remade while i wasn't connected.

But the kicker?

I'm now exempt from being autofilled.

So i can afk in a game, and get the ability to not get auto filled, this is rito logic 101.

replies.body: Problem is after you afk using this method a few times you will get bans...
Well to be fair you get autofill protection by disbanding your lobby and remaking it...
